Queen of Hearts:

Prepare the beer, remove the sample and get a reward!

Here, note: the Recipe - Elven ale. To prepare, gather Malt, Hops and Yeast.

It is only at first it seems difficult. Drink Elven ale, enjoy the holiday and get prizes! Well, I wish You good luck! Gifts and tasty beer waiting for You!


Firstly, Elven ale You can get a Scroll of Transformation in Unicorn Transformation Scroll in Armored Dragon, a Scroll of Benefits. The resurrection, the CP Elixir, Elixir of Mental Strength, Elixir of Life, a Great Quick Healing Potion, Beer from Dion.

Secondly, for Beer from Dion rely Scroll: Modify Weapon (A), Stone of Life High Quality Grade R, Scroll: enchant Armor (A), Royal Drink of the Dwarfs.

Thirdly, for the Royal Drink of the Dwarfs You will get Blessed Scroll: enchant Armor (S), Stone of Life High Quality Grade R, Scroll: enchant Armor (S), Light Beer from Aden.

Fourthly, for a Light Beer from Aden You get the Scroll: Modify Weapon (R), Scroll: enchant Armor (R), Blessed Scroll: Modify Weapon (S), Scroll: Modify Weapon (S).
